channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Longtime Bessemer investor Mary D’Onofrio, who backed Anthropic and Canva, leaves for Crosslink Capital
item.description: D’Onofrio will lead Crosslink’s crossover fund, where she will focus on AI vertical software and infrastructure, making a small number of "high convic...

item.title: A father jumped overboard to save his daughter who fell from a Disney cruise ship returning to Florida
item.description: Crew members from a Disney cruise ship saved a girl who fell overboard and her father who jumped in after her.

item.title: Trump’s ‘Big Beautiful Bill’ is threatening to upend multi-billion dollar investments promising thousands of new jobs for a Georgia town
item.description: Republicans in Congress want to gut the subsidies for projects across the country in a tax cut bill.

item.title: This summer will be decisive for the economy and Wall Street
item.description: More fiscal sticker shock could send Treasury yields higher and add more pressure on the dollar, which is already down 10% this year, its worst first-...

item.title: Ford workers told their CEO ‘none of the young people want to work here.’ So Jim Farley took a page out of the founder’s playbook
item.description: Ford founder Henry Ford decided in 1914 to more than double factory wages to $5 a day, jump-starting the American middle class.
